data.title: Christopher J. Reid
data.meta_description: Chris Reid is CEO of Integrity. Chris started his career as an automation engineer, providing software solutions to the chemical and pharmaceutical industry. For the past 30+ years, Chris has provided IT program governance and IT quality solutions to global regulated companies. Chris is a former ISPE Board Member, ISPE GAMP Global Chair and currently holds positions on the ISPE Foundation Board and GAMP Global Steering Committee.
